This is a 'demo version' of the game In The City
It contains none of the story elements of the final game, but demonstrates the game systems as a playable trailer.
You will be given the opportunity to pick a character class from one of 3 choices: survivalist, negotiator, and technologist.
Survivalist is a rogue/fighter style class,
Negotiator is a bard, more or less, but is the most balanced of the 3 classes.
